---
title: "AirModel"
format: html
---



```{r}
colnames(airquality) <- tolower(colnames(airquality))

air <-
  airquality |>
  as_tibble() |>
  na.omit() |> 
  select(-day) |> 
  mutate(month = factor(month)) 
```

```{r}
air$month.replace (1:4 - zima, 4:7 wiosna etc.)
```


```{r}
temp ~ ozone + solar.r + wind + month
```
